welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nagahama, a charming city known for its beautiful gardens, historic temples, and traditional crafts. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Nagahama has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Yokarou (翼果楼)
restaurants.description: Yokarou (翼果楼) is a japanese restaurant located in 長浜市.
